gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hornets 118, Cavaliers 111
gameRecap.excerpt: Brandon Miller put up 31 points and a career-high seven 3PM for the Hornets as they defeated the Cavaliers, 118-111. Miles Bridges (17 points, five rebounds) and Vasilije Micic (11 points, 12 assists) added a combined 28 points for the Hornets in the victory, while Jarrett Allen tallied a team-high 24 points (11-14 FG), along with eight rebounds and three assists for the Cavaliers in the losing effort. The Hornets improve to 18-54 on the season, while the Cavaliers fall to 44-29.
